name: Boss
text: Hey, Little Guy! Welcome back from your two-week paws.

name: Boss
text: While you were gone, we assigned you to a new project.

name: Boss
text: It’s super top secret, so I’m not really allowed to tell you a whole lot.

name: Boss
text: I think legally, I can tell you that it *might* or *might not* involve the creation of a certain, uh...

name: Little Guy
text: instrument? i didnt know we made pianos

name: Boss
text: I’ll email the details to you later,

name: Boss
text: but right meow, I just need you to get up to speed and report back on how the team’s doing.

name: Boss
text: Great! I trust you still remember where your desk is.
